projects.title: Resume Web Site
projects.text: This project is actually the webpage you’re on right now! The purpose of the site is to function both as a resume and a portfolio for job applications. The site is built using the framework Vue.

projects.title: Thesis Web App
projects.text: With the help of this application I gathered data to be able to accomplish my thesis paper. The application presents texts with different fonts and font sizes to the participants. Some examples of the measured values are: the participants’ personal preferences, scroll length and touch interactions. The front end is built upon React and the back end uses Firebase and NodeJS.

projects.title: Small Trivia App
projects.text: This is a small trivia quiz which is built upon Vue and gets the trivia questions from an API.

projects.title: Auranest Dashboard
projects.text: As a part of my studies at Malmö University there was a degree project which was performed in cooperation with real companies in the industry. The degree project I was part of built an in house dashboard for the company Auranest. The dashboard was completely modular with different diagrams for visualising all kinds of data.

projects.title: CSS & Typography
projects.text: This project was used as an independent study which focused on how you can use CSS and typography on the web. Examples of topics included in the study are CSS-properties, animations, what fonts work well with others and finding the perfect size for paragraphs. This resulted in three smaller websites to practice what was learned during the studies.
